title: I agree with what Dunkey said a few years ago.
body:
Why is getting banned for calling someone names even a thing?

Fucking mute the player, it's there for a reason. I promise you if we all held hands and stop being insecure little bitches and just mute the player, your games would go a lot better. 

"But that won't stop them from inting".

Ok, they're not trying anyways because the second they type something out, they don't give a fuck anymore.

I can easily indirectly int every game and get away with it, simply by saying "I'm lagging". Stop being ignorant please.
